statements: SELECT * FROM AdultLearnersAttendance;
SELECT learner_id, attendance_status FROM AdultLearnersAttendance;
SELECT workshop_id, event_id FROM AdultLearnersAttendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM AdultLearnersAttendance WHERE workshop_id = 1;
SELECT learner_id, participation_status FROM AdultLearnersAttendance ORDER BY learner_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearnersAttendance WHERE learner_id = 1;
SELECT learner_id, workshop_id, attendance_status FROM AdultLearnersAttendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT learner_id, workshop_id, event_id FROM AdultLearnersAttendance WHERE workshop_id = 5 AND event_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearnersAttendance ORDER BY learner_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT workshop_id) AS total_workshops FROM AdultLearnersAttendance;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, email FROM AdultLearners WHERE id = 3
SELECT workshop_name, event_date FROM WorkshopsEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM WorkshopsEvents WHERE attendance_count >= 50 ORDER BY attendance_count ASC
SELECT id, participation_status FROM WorkshopsEvents WHERE workshop_name = 'Machine Learning Workshop'
SELECT id, name, age, email FROM AdultLearners WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners WHERE name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS oldest_age, MIN(age) AS youngest_age FROM AdultLearners;
SELECT workshop_name, event_date, attendance_count FROM WorkshopsEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, participation_status FROM AdultLearners INNER JOIN WorkshopsEvents ON AdultLearners.id = WorkshopsEvents.id WHERE attendance_count > 50 AND participation_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners;
SELECT name, age FROM AdultLearners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT title, facilitator_name FROM Workshops WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT email FROM AdultLearners WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT learner_id, workshop_id, attendance_date FROM Attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, email FROM AdultLearners ORDER BY age ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT workshop_id, title, facilitator_name FROM Workshops WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT a.name, w.title, att.attendance_date FROM AdultLearners a INNER JOIN Attendance att ON a.learner_id = att.learner_id INNER JOIN Workshops w ON att.workshop_id = w.workshop_id WHERE att.participation_level = 'High' ORDER BY a.name;

SELECT a.name, w.title, att.participation_level FROM AdultLearners a INNER JOIN Attendance att ON a.learner_id = att.learner_id INNER JOIN Workshops w ON att.workshop_id = w.workshop_id WHERE att.attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT w.title, w.location, COUNT(att.learner_id) AS total_attendance FROM Workshops w LEFT JOIN Attendance att ON w.workshop_id = att.workshop_id GROUP BY w.title, w.location ORDER BY total_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM adult_learners;
SELECT name, age FROM adult_learners;
SELECT event_name, event_type, date FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT attendance_status, name FROM attendance INNER JOIN adult_learners ON attendance.learner_id = adult_learners.learner_id;
SELECT workshop_name, location FROM workshops WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM adult_learners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, gender FROM adult_learners WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT workshop_name, date FROM workshops WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT e.event_name, a.attendance_status FROM events e JOIN attendance a ON e.event_id = a.event_id WHERE e.event_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners;
SELECT learner_name, age, email FROM AdultLearners WHERE age > 30;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, instructor_name FROM Workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT learner_name, event_name, participation_date FROM AdultLearners INNER JOIN Participation ON AdultLearners.learner_id = Participation.learner_id ORDER BY participation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM AdultLearners WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY learner_name DESC
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM Workshops WHERE workshop_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendees, workshop_name FROM Attendance INNER JOIN Workshops ON Attendance.workshop_id = Workshops.workshop_id GROUP BY workshop_name ORDER BY total_attendees DESC
SELECT DISTINCT event_location FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01'

SELECT learner_name, event_name FROM AdultLearners INNER JOIN Participation ON AdultLearners.learner_id = Participation.learner_id INNER JOIN Events ON Participation.event_id = Events.event_id WHERE event_date < '2022-11-01'
